artist: Painter: After Francesco Solimena; Engraver: Robert de Launay le Jeune
description: Holy Family resting on the flight to Egypt; Virgin and Child on left; Joseph tending bull on right; two angels
inscription:
Signature,  and Inscription

 in image upper right corner: 45 | Below image in black: Solimena Pinx.  Delaunay le Je. sc. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | on sheet in pencil: 2-414
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 45
